-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Provide library support for ghc-pkg information
--   
--   A library that lists the installed packages in a given sandbox and/or
--   in the global and user package databases
@package ghc-pkg-lib
@version 0.3


-- | Packages from packages databases (global, user). see
--   <a>http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1522104/how-to-programmatically-retrieve-ghc-package-information</a>
module Language.Haskell.Packages

-- | Fetch the installed package info from the global and user package.conf
--   databases, mimicking the functionality of ghc-pkg.
getPkgInfos :: Maybe FilePath -> IO InstalledPackagesList
